input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Pro Delta Bib Black"
Reference Product Description:
The Delta Pro Bibshorts represents the pinnacle of versatility and durability in our PRO bibshorts models and is one of our most popular bibshorts. Featuring deltaâ€™s textural face fabric and a wide fitting range, it offers a perfect balance of comfort and performance. The Pro-Ventilated Elastic Brace Paneling ensures breathability, while our renowned shock absorption technology and patented Antimicrobial Hydrophilic Chamois make it the ultimate choice for long rides. Built for all-day wear, the Delta Pro Bibshorts is suitable for any climate and any condition.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='MAAP Team Evo Bib Short'
  - Name='MAAP Team Bib Evo Cargo'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Team Bib Evo Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha EF Education EasyPost Pro Team 2025 Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Canyon Active 8" Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Canyon Short with Liner'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Brevet Lightweight Cargo Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Sportful Giara Overshort Men's'
  - Name='Rapha Lightweight Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Sportful Neo Bib Shorts Black'
  - Name='Castelli Entrata Bibshort'
  - Name='Man Sportful Srk Bibshort 1124028'
  - Name='Endura Men's Pro SL II Bib Tights'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Competizione Bib Shorts'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Free Aero RC Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='SPORTFUL Matchy Set (cycling jersey + cycling shorts) Set (2 pieces), for men'
  - Name='Assos Mille GTO Bib Shorts'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Velocissimo IV Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Endura Men's FS260 Bibshort'
  - Name='Sportful Neo Short'
  - Name='Man Sportful Fiandre Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Women Sportful Giara Shorts'
  - Name='Sportful Light Pro Cycling Jersey + Shorts Set'
  - Name='Sportful Fiandre NORAIN Water Repellent Men's Fleece Cycling Bib Shorts L'
  - Name='ASSOS - MILLE GT Bib Shorts C2 BlackSeries L'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product is a bib short similar in function and design to the reference, likely designed for performance cycling, making it highly relevant.
This is a bib short with cargo features, adding utility but still very similar in core function and silhouette to the reference bibshorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Men's Team Bib Evo Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: The name indicates it is a men's bib short closely matching the reference product's type and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha EF Education EasyPost Pro Team 2025 Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Professional level bib shorts similar in function and likely construction to the reference, highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Canyon Active 8" Cycling Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are cycling shorts but not bib shorts; lacking the bib upper portion reduces relevance but still related as cycling lower wear.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Canyon Short with Liner
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Standard cycling shorts with liner but no bib construction, less relevant compared to bib shorts but still related.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Brevet Lightweight Cargo Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lightweight bib shorts with cargo features, similar construction but with an added cargo aspect, mostly relevant.
An overshort worn over bib shorts or shorts; it is a different product type and silhouette, low relevance.
Bib shorts similar in style and function but designed as lightweight variant; closely aligned with reference.
Standard bib shorts very similar in type and function; highly relevant.
A bib short product with similar intended use and construction, highly relevant.
Named bibshort, very similar product category to the reference, relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Endura Men's Pro SL II Bib Tights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib tights differ from bib shorts by having full leg coverage, but similar bib construction, moderately relevant.
Professional cycling bib shorts, very close to the reference product in function and construction; near identical category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Free Aero RC Cycling Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High performance cycling bib shorts nearly identical in purpose and construction to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: SPORTFUL Matchy Set (cycling jersey + cycling shorts) Set (2 pieces), for men
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes cycling shorts but likely not bib shorts, plus a jersey; bib shorts only are more relevant.
Top-tier bib shorts with advanced features, identical product category matching reference bib shorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Velocissimo IV Cycling Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling bib shorts similar to reference product, very relevant.
Bib short product close in form and function to the reference bibshorts.
Standard cycling short without bib design, significantly different construction and silhouette.
Bib shorts similar in design and use to the reference product.
Women's shorts without bib construction, and different gender fit; low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Light Pro Cycling Jersey + Shorts Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes jersey and shorts, but shorts are likely not bib shorts; less relevant to bib short reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Fiandre NORAIN Water Repellent Men's Fleece Cycling Bib Shorts L
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib shorts similar in construction but designed for cold/wet conditions, mostly relevant with some functional differences.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: ASSOS - MILLE GT Bib Shorts C2 BlackSeries L
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A high-end bib short closely matching the reference product in function and construction; extremely relevant.
